sub_concepts.name: Black Hole
sub_concepts.definition: A region of space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape from it.

sub_concepts.name: Gravitational Singularity
sub_concepts.definition: A point in space where gravity is infinite and the laws of physics as we know them cease to be useful.

sub_concepts.name: Cosmic Censorship Hypothesis
sub_concepts.definition: A conjecture in theoretical physics which suggests that naked singularities cannot exist in our universe.

sub_concepts.name: Event Horizon
sub_concepts.definition: The boundary around a black hole beyond which nothing can escape.

sub_concepts.name: Spaghettification
sub_concepts.definition: A hypothetical process by which an object would be stretched and spaghetti-like when falling into a black hole.
